website_summaries.verdict: This model is an attractive option for single users in small homes or apartments.
pros: Offers a range that easily covers all spots in a small home
Helps find the best location for optimal coverage
Simple push button setup and prime signal locator included
300 Mbps bandwidth is more than enough bandwidth for the average single user
cons: Users in larger homes may find the range on this model does not reach all parts of their home

customer_reviews.title: Dlink DAP-1620-EXO wifi extender
customer_reviews.text: The new dlink android app sets this extender up with a few key strokes. I now have a very effective new wifi system that with this extender enables us to have high speed internet access to easily play videos at the same time on multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like that the range extender is easy to set up. Just follow the steps on the app and it’s good to go. I would, however, more advanced network monitoring and adjustments for this extender. Reminder, it is an extender, so it’s only going to extend the signal that it is receiving. Overall happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Barker

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: I have a computer 20 feet away from the repeater/extender, signal strength is ok, speed is slow, it takes a long time to load a page and the videos run/stop/run/stop with intervals of about 20 second stops vs. 5 second run time.
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I can finally watch prime videos on my Kindle in bed at night, or listen to internet radio in my yard. It took a little doing to set up for me, as my modem doesn't have WPS. But I called my internet provider, and spoke to a great guy who helped me set it up over the Internet. It took some figuring out, but now it works like a charm! And the best thing is, once it has been connected, one can simply unplug it and move it around the house as needed. It will reconnect it's self. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Extend your internet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I wanted to extend the range of my wifi for basic devices like wifi camera, cell phones, echo dot, etc for my backyard.. With the 300mbs, I figured this would be enough for these devices. In addition to that, it has a network connection in case I wanted to wire something up. So far so good. My wifi camera has not lost signal, where before it was often and my range is indeed extended.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to work for a few months (I was using it to extend the signal to other parts of the house for family members). Family members started complaining of dropped connectivity, and I discovered an orange LED was lit on the device. I unplugged it, plugged it back in, LEDs turned green and it started to work briefly, and then dropped signal and went back into an error state. etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Williams

customer_reviews.title: Problem solver
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have a wireless N router on the second floor of my house. My son has his computer in the basement family room on the opposite position. He always had lousy download speeds. I set this up approx halfway on the first floor and now he gets decent speeds. I have 60 mbps service and before he only received maybe 2 to 3 mbps. Now he gets 10 plus mbps. Easy to install. Just follow the included instructions. Had it up and running in 10 minutes. Make sure you unfold the antennas on the extender. Makes a huge difference in signal quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit? Inadequate instructions & multiple setup fails
customer_reviews.text: I tried the two methods in the device manual, one poorly written by an unqualified tech writer, and both failed. Then I contacted their chat line and that method failed, i.e., using a dlink.local webpage. As far as I'm concerned this device and the company are frauds. Very ticked off by this experience.
customer_reviews.author: To The Point

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for from D-Link.
customer_reviews.text: PROs: Small, inexpensive, good signal quality. CONs: POOR PERFORMANCE.. From the description "Up to 300Mbps wireless performance for reliable, everyday performance". This is a falsehood as your getting a poorly 1 MB/s internet. I tried different channels, different wireless modes and received no improvement as to the speed. For some, this is fine as they aren't heavy internet users, unfortunately I am not one of them and this product does not work for me or other like me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It worked great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I was torn with all the reviews, but this thing is great! The room is very far from the main router and there was absolutely no signal in there prior to this. There is full signal now and all my WiFi needs work great!
customer_reviews.author: drucke1

customer_reviews.title: Works well to extend your signal
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to extend my WiFi signal to my home’s first floor from an upstairs router. The dead spot in my kitchen behind the masonry fireplace is now eliminated !
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with my purchase and would likely have bought for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought open box for $16. I was pleased with my purchase and would likely have bought for the regular price. It works great especially considering the price. Granted, I live in a two bedroom condo, but it works well for my situation and space. I stream all the time with no issues, and have solid connections with my devices.
customer_reviews.author: bmac

customer_reviews.title: EZ to install, but constantly drops connection
customer_reviews.text: This extender was very easy to set up, and it doubled the wifi speed in my back bedroom, but it kept going down/losing my connection bout every 1/2 hour so so, which is useless when I have to teach my classes on Zoom. I just stopped using it. It even severed the connection with my main wifi router (it sets up a parallel wifi connection for the distant party to use). And whether I used this with 1 or 2 people,, it still kept severing my connections. I have an Xfinity wifi/wired modem.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Helped to extend range from home router
customer_reviews.text: Really helped extend the range from my home router by the front door, so we can have better internet access on our deck. There was a $5 off coupon when I purchased this, so that is why I bought this brand and model.
customer_reviews.author: CorvetteDude

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Installing was pretty straight forward. Seems to be working ok.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: An excellent buy that fully met expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this D-Link extender sincerely hoping that it would seamlessly connect to my D-Link wireless router -- which it did easily and flawlessly on first try. The Ethernet connector is a big plus and a great option not found on similar devices even at higher prices. This extender increased wireless signal strength by about 50% relative to the previous situation and enabled a cable connection to the end-use device which had big trouble staying connected wirelessly even with the amplified signal. This is a reliable product and a very worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Gooding

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Second one for the cottage. First one extended range to living room. This one did the job to route around a large concrete fireplace to get signal to addition. Easy set up, good price, excellent result with D-link router.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Does What It Needs To
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have any dead spots in my home but I had an issue keeping my wireless smoker temperature monitor on line so I bought this and installed it inside within 10 feet of the smoker. Now I can see my smoker and meat temperatures from anywhere on earth! Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: The Donald

customer_reviews.title: It is a regular product
customer_reviews.text: If you have several corners and walls from the router until thr extender you don't have good signal.
customer_reviews.author: Iver Arrieta

customer_reviews.title: Item weak.
customer_reviews.text: Like: easy install Dislike: item stopped working less than 6 months. Tossed it out in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: audio

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she absolutely loves it! It works great. I'm thinking that those who had problems with this device might be due to operator error. Just make sure that you have a D-link router with the sync button and a cell phone or computer and setup should be easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Walker

customer_reviews.title: It extends excellently and works great now.
customer_reviews.text: Almost sent back since I could not get it to read my router, but searched internet and someone said same thing but gave instructions on pushing buttons and waiting and I got it to work. It extends excellently and works great now.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Price effective for 2G with 20-30% improvement
customer_reviews.text: I had to call help desk to configure it! It's for 2G networks only as advertised and improvement is there. As it is this device offered 20-30% improvement in band speed over 2G but I can use 5G for better performance in same space.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I got this to be able to connect when I’m working on my garage. Some days it works, some days it just doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great, really improved our WiFi signal throughout our house
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great performance, easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Only took 25 min. to install. Longer to change WiFi and password on the many devices that are using it. Signal went from poor and weak to excellent. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin R. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with phone app. Works great as a wifi extender.
customer_reviews.author: Red1

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good reception with LED strength lights. Easy setup. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ScSpires

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: IT work as well as I was hoping it would
customer_reviews.author: David Burgie

customer_reviews.title: It’s lutearlly useles and has never synced to router
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t sync with router though they are the same brand...instructions did not help a bit
customer_reviews.author: Human/Vulcan Hybrid

customer_reviews.title: Worked well to extend range into corner bedroom that got no wifi coverage
customer_reviews.text: Worked great out of the box to extend range into corner bedroom in house. Not much more to say; did what it was supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Island Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t figure out how to use this, and then my brother who is in IT came and said the wireless connection on this device is defective and won’t work. It connected with the ethernet plugged in directly but not wirelessly despite having reset it twice. Unfortunately, by the time he could diagnose this my window for return had closed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Now this is nice!
customer_reviews.text: This really worked well, right out of the box. Plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth jt
customer_reviews.text: Worked great but my house was so bad that I ended up getting a new router anyway
customer_reviews.author: Brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Good price but poor performance.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but drops signal frequently. Range is definitely not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Spires

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install and sometimes works great but not reliable. Many times, but I can connect to the device but it isn’t connecting to the network
customer_reviews.author: KPS

customer_reviews.title: Extended WiFi Signal Well, Lousy MTBF / Reliability
customer_reviews.text: This worked as expected, extending my WiFi range another 20-30 ft. Except sadly, mine stopped working literally 3 days after Amazon's "allowable return" window. Has anyone else experienced this sort of bad reliability?
customer_reviews.author: Phillip H. Duong

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great must have for vivint to work in big houses
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Jefferies, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly as described, follow directions and it is easy
customer_reviews.author: olof ekbergh

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap! Would not connect to router! Didn't even register as a device I could connect to. It was suppose to show up as d-link device!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul I.

customer_reviews.title: No more dead air space
customer_reviews.text: Great Extender! Easy to set up and get your dead areas covered! We have a big house and were not getting the best coverage out side or in some areas downstairs. I have an Apple airport router and it was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great extender, several options for set-up!
customer_reviews.text: Great extender. My router (ATT Uverse), did not pick up with just pushing the quick connect button. However, this came with a web-based set-up...which worked. We have this on our second floor and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: SweetMagnolia24

customer_reviews.title: Sad this product does not work for me I only ...
customer_reviews.text: Sad this product does not work for me I only gave it one star because it doesn't work for me but it might work for somebody else I had a room 15 feet away and it just doesn't pull the signal there
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Reduces bandwidth be aware
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that extenders reduce your bandwidth by half. I was not aware of this initially. Even a low signal for my router gave far faster download speed. Only use this for situations where you have no wifi signal.
customer_reviews.author: stratdude83

customer_reviews.title: cheap wifi range extender
customer_reviews.text: I was very good and the setup was not difficult so if you are looking for a cheap range extender
customer_reviews.author: iluciano

customer_reviews.title: Signal it's good but not great...
customer_reviews.text: Works. And the sync button its perfect for less hassle. Would hope for more signal but it's not the most expensive so can't complain that much.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Carlos Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works great but one thing you have to do is use your WiFi name with the -ext next to it same password by doing that you get better connection I love it better than linksys
customer_reviews.author: Julio Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Complete Lemon!!
customer_reviews.text: This adds no additional range of WiFi. Complete waste of money. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Erika Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought them and found better ones for a little more. I should have waited. I’m not convinced they really work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Using to boost signal to the front of the house ...
customer_reviews.text: Using to boost signal to the front of the house that is far from the modem and works most of the time, have had some issues of low signal.
customer_reviews.author: Cel

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought other popular WiFi range extenders but this one has worked the best for me so far and has easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extends good Wi-Fi range
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far, I have been using it upstairs in our house in the far corner from the wireless router, and now I have a great signal to access the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. Maybe not the strongest, but great for the price. For those who are not familiar with these products, this is best if it is line of sight from your computer and to the room you want your secondary device to work. Can't say as to set up, because I made my son connect it for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Patricia T.

customer_reviews.title: EXO Mesh works great.
customer_reviews.text: Used this guy with EXO mesh router to better cover house. I wired the extender with 1 Gig Ethernet. Very happy with coverage. Don’t have to change SSID as I move around house.
customer_reviews.author: Rohhie

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: A bit funky to link to my router but it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Farmhugger

customer_reviews.title: Product failed after several days to communicate with our Sony ...
customer_reviews.text: Product failed after several days to communicate with our Sony Bravia TV's Wi Fi communication system, after initially being very successful.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Nice small size and easy to set up with the WPF button.
customer_reviews.author: Will Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up descent range for a one level house.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. It tend to loose the synchronization with the main router but when it is connected works ok.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: great extender, really helped in providing wifi all over ...
customer_reviews.text: great extender, really helped in providing wifi all over the house
customer_reviews.author: Todd J King

customer_reviews.title: decent extension. Limitations: needs to be facing the ...
customer_reviews.text: decent extension. Limitations: needs to be facing the router, needs to be near an outlet. Does the job well in a two-bedroom apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Ogawak

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Not good enough for a 1000 SQ foot one story home.
customer_reviews.author: chris2fer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great as of now, let's see how it hold up
customer_reviews.author: Idiot for this one....

customer_reviews.title: D-Link Wireless Range Extender (DAP-1330)
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to set up. I am using the D-Link to extend my WI-Fi range. .It works better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Installed device
customer_reviews.text: WPS was easy. Just make sure to follow instructions on installation.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Williams

customer_reviews.title: What I had hoped it would do.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective. Plugged the device in, easy setup, put it to work! The device extended my local Wi-Fi coverage greater than 75 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Will be sending it back it won’t connect to my router
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great extender!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Had to call support to get initial connection to work, but went simply, and after connection established works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: KDG

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me. I have my Wi-Fi device ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. I have my Wi-Fi device in another room, behind walls, approximately 25 meters away from the extender.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt

customer_reviews.title: If you need wireless service in all around the house, purchase this device
customer_reviews.text: The D-Link wireless Range Extender works well in my house. I get can use service on my devices in areas I couldn't before. I'm glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miz Val

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and hookup
customer_reviews.text: And it boosted the signal to the level required for my use...
customer_reviews.author: Dick Johannsen

customer_reviews.title: excellent performance and would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used as a wired access point for outside coverage from a D-Link DIR-655....excellent performance and would highly recommend. Simple and easy to connect. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: DFK

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy since my router is also a D-link product
customer_reviews.text: This unit does an adequate job of providing me an access point at the other end of our house instead of installing a 50 foot long cat5 cable. Set up was easy since my router is also a D-link product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this Item is junk !!!
customer_reviews.text: Would not connect to my Uverse router so it is useless !!!
customer_reviews.author: cliff p.

customer_reviews.title: Had to go through too much, no customer support with this product
customer_reviews.text: Really doesn’t work well with other d-link product which is surprising
customer_reviews.author: Derex Woumnm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way easy to set up and helped with internet signal to all areas of the house, good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Chopard

customer_reviews.title: Very good product that performed well as long as I used ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product that performed well as long as I used it. My computer guy out in a different system. Really too soon to give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore E. Hitt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly right out of the box and has greatly improved the wifi signal in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up. Instantly improved my wifi upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: ... for my husband who went to norway and had bad wifi, it worked great through an adapter and ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who went to norway and had bad wifi, it worked great through an adapter and was easy to set up (he doesn't know how to do any of that stuff, so for him to manage it, it had to be easy). I actually ordered ths one by mistake meaning to order another one that was 3x as expensive from the same company. But this worked out. His range went from 1 bars to 4. This was using a router in barracks, which was down at the end of a hallway (about 15 rooms down from him)
customer_reviews.author: ItsME

customer_reviews.title: It must be okay for some people, but unfortunately ...
customer_reviews.text: It must be okay for some people, but unfortunately, it is not comparable to the specific router I have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to hook up and it has made a huge difference in my WiFi
customer_reviews.author: felicia

customer_reviews.title: Used it for a month and it just stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a month and it just stopped working. Won't turn on in any of the outlets in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Barton

customer_reviews.title: Was difficult to get it to work on some laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: Was difficult to get it to work on some laptop with Windows 7 . It regulates down - to red yellow often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fair range
customer_reviews.text: Does an acceptable job, but range is significantly impacted by intervening walls that were not a problem with other D-Link range extenders I have had. It has strong signal otherwise, but I would buy something different next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You click on the item and it shows the right ...
customer_reviews.text: You click on the item and it shows the right item I wanted, a d-link with the plugs for the Italian outlet. When it arrived (in Italy), it was the plug for American outlets. Why not show the proper picture for the item purchased?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not deliver range I was hoping for. Signal drops in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Humrug

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Wont let me connect to my wireless network unless i plug it in to my router with a ethernet cable
customer_reviews.author: eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Adds a good signal boost
customer_reviews.text: plugged this in the other end of my apt and now i have wifi on the front and back porch
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Distance
customer_reviews.text: Now I know able to sit out front and watch a movie while I am grilling
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O.

product_meta.title: D-Link Wifi Extender N300 Range Wall Signal Booster Ethernet Wireless Internet Network Repeater (DAP-1330)
product_meta.description: Model:N300 WiFi Range ExtenderThe wireless range extender (DAP-1330) extends your existing wireless network coverage with the push of a button, delivering up to 300Mbps for whole-home coverage. Ideal for hard-to-reach areas like basements, upstairs bedrooms or outdoor areas, The compact wireless range extender gives you performance where you need it most.
feature_bullets: Helps find the best location for optimal coverage
Ideal for homes that are pre-wired for Ethernet and for extended wireless coverage
Easily access all Features through the new user interface
Up to 300Mbps wireless performance for reliable, everyday performance
Compatible with virtually all wireless devices and routers
Quickly setup your wireless range extender with the push of a button

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars625 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
